addWorldAsset(uint256,address,bytes32).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by factory contract

params.amounts: Amount of each resources to transfer
params.to: An address which will receive resources

init(address,address,address,address,add.details: Called by address which created current instance

mintResources(uint256,string,address,uin.details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by mighty creator

mintUnits(uint256,string,address,uint256.details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by mighty creator

mintWorkers(uint256,address,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by mighty creator

setGameFinishTime(uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by mighty creator or reward pool

setGameStartTime(uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by mighty creator

epochs.details: Updated when world initialized or #destroy is called

NewWorldEpoch(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when world initialized or #destroyCurrentEpoch is called

addWorldAsset(uint256,address,bytes32).notice: Adds an address as world asset

batchTransferResources(uint256,address,s.notice: Transfers multiple resources to provided address

destroyCurrentEpoch().notice: Destroys current epoch if conditions are met

worldAssets(uint256,address).notice: Mapping containing world asset type by provided epoch number and address
